thread.title: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy
thread.title_full: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy

title: John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy
text:
John Legend, Chrissy Teigen announce pregnancy 10:55 p.m. Monday, Oct. 12, 2015 | Filed in: Celebrity news ï»¿ 
John Legend and Chrissy Teigen are expecting their first child. 
The 36-year-old musician and 29-year-old model announced the pregnancy Monday on Instagram. A spokeswoman for Teigen confirmed the social media post. FILE - In this July 18, 2011 file photo, model Chrissy Teigen, left, and singer John Legend pose for photos after the Dineila Brazil swim suit show during the Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week in Miami Beach, Fla. Teigen and Legend announced on their Instagram accounts, Monday, Oct. 12, that they are expecting their first child. (AP Photo/J Pat Carter, File) 
Legend and Teigen revealed the news by posting a black-and-white photo of themselves with the caption: "We're pregnant!" Teigen wrote that conceiving a child hasn't been easy for the pair and that they are looking forward to growing their family. 
The "All of Me" singer-songwriter and "FABlife" co-host have been married since 2013. FILE - In this Feb. 22, 2015 file photo, Chrissy Teigen, left, and her husband John Legend arrive at the Oscars in Los Angeles. Teigen and Legend announced on their Instagram accounts, Monday, Oct. 12, that they are expecting their first child. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File) FILE - In this Aug. 30, 2015 file photo, Chrissy Teigen, left, and John Legend arrive at the MTV Video Music Awards in Los Angeles. Teigen and Legend announced on their Instagram accounts, Monday, Oct. 12, that they are expecting their first child. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File)
